installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
echo "DayZ Egg Star-X"
echo "(c) Copyright 2024 - SwitchCompagnie"
# Installation des utilitaires nécessaires
echo "Installing Utils"
apt update && apt install -y wget lib32gcc1

# Déplacer vers le répertoire du serveur
cd /mnt/server || exit

# Vérification et création du répertoire du serveur si nécessaire
config_dir="/mnt/server/Dragons/Saved/Config/LinuxServer"
mkdir -p "$config_dir"

# Steam Params Install
SRCDS_APPID=221100
if [ "${STEAM_USER}" == "" ]; then
    echo -e "Steam user is not set.\n"
    echo -e "Using anonymous user.\n"
    STEAM_USER=anonymous
    STEAM_PASS=""
    STEAM_AUTH=""
else
    echo -e "User set to ${STEAM_USER}"
fi

# Téléchargement et rendu exécutable SteamCMD
echo "Downloading SteamCMD"
wget -O steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
chmod +x steamcmd.tar.gz
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamapps

# Téléchargement des fichiers de démarrage et de configuration par défaut depuis GitHub
echo "Downloading startup script and default config files from Github"
wget -O "$config_dir/Game.ini" https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SulivanM/DayZ-Pelican-Egg-Fixed/main/Game.ini
wget -O "/mnt/server/startup.sh" https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SulivanM/DOD-Pelican-Egg-Fixed/main/startup.sh

# Installation Du Jeu Via SteamCMD
echo "Downloading Game With SteamCMD"
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd
./steamcmd.sh +force_install_dir /mnt/server +login ${STEAM_USER} ${STEAM_PASS} ${STEAM_AUTH} +app_update ${SRCDS_APPID} ${EXTRA_FLAGS} validate +quit

# Mise En Place Library 32 Bit
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
cp -v linux32/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so

# Mise En Place Library 64 Bit
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64
cp -v linux64/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so

echo "Install Finished !"
